html:
2.4.19  6:17 am   We know you've been saying you don't want to announce the release date for your new project in case you mess it up, but can you give us a hint?

     sure

2.4.19  2:40 am   i want ten trillion dollars how do i get it

     borrow it from a friendly nation

2.4.19  2:28 am   Would you consider telling me your favorite car?

     one of the flying ones

2.4.19  2:16 am   will the new thing be release before some time, or after?

     before

2.4.19  1:41 am   Have you tried making a song about yourself?

     sure

      Other than "I'm a person" 

     yes

2.4.19  1:33 am   Did you watch the sportball?

     no
2.4.19  1:05 am   answer this once and for all: are you gonna go on tour?

2.4.19  12:35 am   during your live show, would it make you happy if the audience sang along ("that's when i'll know it worked") or would you prefer that they listened quietly and took in your/the band's performance?

     need to account for both

2.3.19  8:57 pm   your lack of optimism about your next project will never stop me from being relentlessly excited about it. do you think you'll do more stuff like it (whatever it is) in the future

     yes, but with a slightly more coherent plan

2.3.19  8:06 pm   how's the current video-in-making going?

     good

2.3.19  7:51 pm   should i do what i need to

     yes

2.3.19  7:47 pm   yo, just wanted to chime in and say that I'm pumped for the experimental content, even if it's a "train wreck"  with no known release date

     it has a known release date, but i am not saying because i am tired of being embarassed when i fuck everything up

2.3.19  6:25 pm   What do you think of grapefruits?

     i would need to first do some research to find out what the hell they are

2.3.19  6:18 pm   Bill do you know what a concept album is?

     i guess

      Elo released one in 1981 called "Time,"    and I just wanted to tell you that. It's so amazing! I think if you were to ever make an album, it should be a concept album. I just love when every song relates to a fuller story while each individual song has a messege

      i find i can get stronger results when i can more deeply integrate the music and non-music, to the point where in its strongest conceptual form i don't think it would resemble a list of songs, and therefore could hardly be called an album. it would also have visual elements, and the entire product would likely be most accurately called a 'video'

2.3.19  5:00 pm   In long long long journey, triangle man goes to the museum and says MOST of the paintings were painted by somebody else. Does this mean he is a famous painter and some of his work has been displayed in the museum?

      the purpose of phrasing it that way is to add a sense of curiosity to that line, which you are now fully exploring

2.3.19  4:42 pm   when's your next vid gonna come out?

     i can't tell you

2.3.19  2:28 pm   What is the worst part about making a video?

     not being able to make a different video instead

2.3.19  2:20 pm   I think I saw you skiing 

     you did not

2.3.19  1:53 pm   Can I commission you for a short vid?

     you can try

2.3.19  9:24 am   you said you did a bad thing.

     not necessarily, but i have used that for song lyrics before

      What did you do?

     wrote a song

2.3.19  7:21 am   Did you private "a brief history of spain and portugal" because it was flagged for misleading? 

     it was removed and i was given a strike, 3 years after it was released, on christmas day 2017

2.3.19  4:47 am   What is the subject matter of your exciting new project that definitely isn't a train wreck?

     frolicking too hard and then seeking punishment

2.3.19  3:29 am   What is your favorite lake on this planet earth?

     Lake Superior

2.3.19  2:34 am   how does one initiate conversation with another human?

     there are 2 simple ways. one is to say 'hi' and the other is to talk about whatever world-wide catastrophe is currently occuring

2.3.19  2:29 am   so what happened to the whole making a song every two weeks for at least a year thing?

     i got greedy and tried to add more and failed spectacularly

      i mean i know you tried adding in more stuff and got a bit derailed and have been struggling to get back on a schedule but now you're working on a non-song video? i mean that's cool and i'm looking forward to it but....i guess what i'm wondering is do you have a plan to get back on a strict song+video schedule again soon? cause songs are fun

     the main priorities since december are: 1. do not reduce the song schedle from what it was last fall, and 2. add in some type of non-song content in addition to that. the only problem to solve is how in flying hell is that possible, which may seem like a big problem but i've solved it before

2.3.19  12:08 am   How can I keep from being discouraged when others tell me that art is something i can't pursue forever? I feel like I'm being put down a lot for wanting to make creativity a career.

     perhaps you could re-orient yourself to a higher position where they are unable to push you down from. maybe from that point you could start pushing them down, as revenge

2.2.19  11:39 pm   could one find a means of contacting you outside of random chance on a website that you probably only check occasionally?

     likely

      or is such a thing unrealistic for someone such as yourself?

     it can be difficult because the schedules and goals i set for myself are usually outlandish

      are you into philosophy?

     back in my day we just called it thinking

      and again, your content is a literal gem. it takes work, dedication, and real talent.

     that's nice of you

      not to mention how ridiculously rare real creativity is in today's culture.

     it saddens me that everyone always seems to think creativity is rare in whatever time period they are currently living in. but fortunately the pervasiveness of this view throughout every moment in history amounts to sufficient proof that it's not true and never has been true

      you don't need to fear having a big ego, and i wouldn't assume you do, but imo you probably should. (not really but you know what i mean)

also is moral realism legit

     never heard of it

      and do you ever plan on opening up your life more to the public?

     yes

      full respect if that's not in your personal agenda because clearly my subjective morality is correct over everyone else's so i'm entitled to state whether or not your decision is respectable.

also is religion legit or man made trash based on nothing but religious dogma rather than historical events from multiple authentic sources and sciency stuff

     the word religion seems to have evolved into a mean word, because it seems like no one ever uses it to describe their own beliefs. only to describe other people's beliefs. so it kind of seems like not a fair word. gets used frequently in fights and debates, etc

2.2.19  11:18 pm   do you consider post-1965 avant garde music jazz?

     never thought about it

2.2.19  10:38 pm   Will the new video be coming out in the next week, or the next month?

     maybe both

2.2.19  10:14 pm   How do you resolve what to go with when multiple things sound right/work well? I'm finding this to be an actual problem because I relatively often come up with wildly different paths for my work that are both satisfying in different ways. Does this happen to you? 

     yes but that's probably better than not having anything at all

2.2.19  9:01 pm   2.1.19  2:38 am Why do you think prime numbers help in making the music have more "originality"

     i never thought of it that way

2.2.19  8:09 pm   Thoughts on math?

     seems legit

2.2.19  7:18 pm   should i pursue what i want to do or pursue something that will realistically get me money

     that depends on how much money you currently have on hand

2.2.19  6:10 pm   is there any industry standard loudness.

     as loud as possible

      i either mix my tracks to loud or not loud enough. how do i find the middle ground

     how would you know they're too loud or too soft unless you already have some middle ground reference you are referring to? this story is full of holes if you ask me

2.2.19  3:58 pm   how much is a bill-ion

     1 thousand million

2.2.19  2:54 pm   What can you say about you current project?

     it's kind of a train wreck

      Is there music involved?

     yes

      Is it a video?

     yes

      Is it by yourself still?

     yes

      Does it take place in your room?

     no

      Does the content involve you?

     yes

      or Are exploring particular subject matter?

     barely

      Will we hear your voice in it?

     yes

      On a sliding scale from Monday Good Firetruck to HotEWIG, how involved is this project?

     involved with what

      How do you feel about it this far?

     it's a kind of a train wreck but it's an experiment that needed to happen, in order to open up some doors

2.2.19  2:51 pm   if u could do anything what would you do?

     convert all the toxic waste and garbage to fresh clean resources

2.2.19  2:46 pm   Since you prefer to release songs individually, do you enjoy listening to albums beginning to end?

     that would require a bit of research to even figure out how an album is supposed to go, and find all the songs and put them in order

      Let's say there's a musician or band that you've loved for a long time, and they release a new album. What do you do while listening to this music that's new to you?

     nothing, just listen to it

2.2.19  2:41 pm   I'm unboxing things. What's the best thing to unbox?

     cold hard cash

2.2.19  2:21 pm   do you still have 2 different copies of quicktime and 3 browsers on your dock

     it's not 'copies', those are 2 different versions which each have different features. they each have some features that the other one doesn't

2.2.19  2:08 pm   I have a philosophy that chords aren't inherently functional; only notes are functional. Like, G7 isn't dominant in C because it's V7, it's dominant because B, D, and F are dominant-sounding notes in C.  

     sure. i don't really know what they mean by 'dominant' (that seems like a deceptive word to me) but yes i agree, chords are just made up of notes and bits of harmony. using letters to symbolize chords can be an extremely handy shortcut if both the writer and reader are thinking of it the same way, but it is still only an approximation of what the actual notes are

2.2.19  1:53 pm   Bill, do you think you wanted to make a song without a video you could make one of those videos where it's just a vinyl spinning?

     that might be painfully disappointing if it goes on a channel which is primarily known for video material

2.2.19  1:39 pm   My teacher said liking the color orange makes me a psychopath. Is that true

     probably the other way around- being a psychopath is what causes you to like the color orange

2.2.19  1:23 pm   Why do you care for music a lot?

     it is a powerful and legendary tool for enhancing any message by directly controlling the emotions of the recipient as they receive the message

2.2.19  1:14 pm   would be cool if your new video is 5 minutes long

     yes but you might be forgetting the uncool underbelly of such an undertaking, which is the time spent making it, during which no other content is made

2.2.19  12:50 pm   you just cant make a bad song can you?

     all my songs are bad

2.2.19  12:39 pm   when do you think you're uploading your next video?

     can't say, don't wanna jinx it

     will it be a long one?

     no

      maybe one like ball and stick?

     similar, but with the added twist of having real life facts and details. nearly resulting in a spectacular train wreck but hey it's a new format. gotta try it

     btw i think you're one of the most talented musicians nowadays

     that's nice of you

2.2.19  11:33 am   Would you make a video about you reading this webpage?

     yes

2.2.19  11:07 am   I personally hate astrology, but I have a couple of friends/acquaintances/family members who are into it and from what I can tell, the attraction of astrology isn't that it can predict the future. 99% of astrology fans don't know if Mercury is in retrograde or what that even means. They couldn't identify a single one of the zodiac constellations in the actual night sky.

The attraction of astrology is that it's an elaborate personality test that encourages a lot of self-reflective navel-gazing, which some people enjoy and find beneficial. For instance, the "typical" positive Aries traits are courage, daring and competitiveness, while the negative traits are self-centeredness, anger and pushiness. Obviously, not every person born in the month of April has these as their dominant traits... but pretty much everyone has these traits present to some extent, so they'll reflect on this crude psychological assessment. An Aries who actually is dari ng and c ompetitive might acknowledge that they come off as rude or attention-seeking to others. And an Aries who's naturally shy might feel empowered by a personality test that tells them that deep down, they're courageous and decisive. Astrology books that promise to give relationship tips for Capricorns and Libras (or whatever) are actually just full of basic good communication advice that will probably smooth a relationship between any two people. So people can feel like they're getting real benefit from astrology.

If people really don't feel like their personality fits their sign, they can get a fancy natal chart done that will tell them that even though their sign in Taurus, the position of Jupiter or whatever counteracts their Taurus traits and makes them a true Scorpio. Astrology is just a very elaborate, mystical personality test that you can manipulate to get whatever results you want. It's really not that different from the MBTI personality test, which is extrem ely popu lar among "rational" people even though it's junk science. People like personality tests and astrology because people like thinking about themselves and coming up with fancy terms to express their identity.

     astrology is often hijacked and re-purposed as a 12-option personality test, but that's not what real astrology actually is

2.2.19  10:52 am   what's your favourite song that you've written?

     i would prefer to write a new one to be my favorite
